ygData.subject: Re: vince archer
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh oh Neil.. we all have our days.. I certainly am no stranger to that.. did you read MY post about the no-no though?  I really hope everyone reads it and
ygData.messageBody:
Heh oh Neil.. we all have our days.. I certainly am no stranger to that.. did you read MY post about the no-no though? I really hope everyone reads it and takes it to heart. I am in the midst of writing a complaint to 989 or verant .. whoever the hell wants to listen to me, about the way the guide treated me and the accusative nature of their remarks. I had good feelings about the staff and now I'm not so sure.



-----Original Message-----
From: Neil Lambert <smartass@...>
To: EQ_Wizards <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, May 20, 1999 3:55 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] vince archer


i just realized how stupid and mean i just sounded and repeal my previous statement. i am just really mad at EQ sorry just delete the other post
